column1: 2111758001|        |custom_skills_install|Custom skill(s) installed. Find them in the Character menu.

2111758002|        |custom_skills_disable|Custom skill(s) disabled. Any skill points used on them have been refunded. If you intend to delete this mod completely, please use the UNINSTALL mode in options.
2111758003|        |custom_skills_uninstall|Custom skill(s) uninstalled. Any skill points used on them have been refunded. Please save, quit Witcher, then delete the mod before continuing.
2111758005|        |custom_skills_repair|Custom skill(s) repaired. Find them in the Character menu.
